hints.thumb_ip: Rest your thumb against the side of your curled fingers.
hints.index_mcp: Curl all four fingers into a fist.

A.position_hint: Hold the sign at chest level in neutral space.
A.orientation_hint: Your palm should face sideways (toward your dominant side).

hints.thumb_ip: Tuck your thumb across your palm.
hints.index_pip: Keep all four fingers straight and together.
hints.pinky_pip: Keep all fingers fully extended upward.

B.position_hint: Hold fingers upright near your shoulder.
B.orientation_hint: Palm should face outward (away from you).

hints.index_mcp: Curve your fingers into a C shape.
hints.thumb_ip: Curve your thumb to mirror your fingers.

C.orientation_hint: Palm faces sideways, forming a C opening.

hints.index_pip: Keep your index finger fully extended and pointing up.
hints.middle_pip: Curl your middle, ring, and pinky fingers down.
hints.thumb_ip: Touch your thumb to your curled fingers.

hints.index_pip: Bend all fingers down at the middle joint.
hints.thumb_ip: Tuck your thumb under your bent fingers.

hints.index_pip: Touch your index finger to your thumb tip.
hints.middle_pip: Keep middle, ring, and pinky fingers extended.

hints.index_pip: Extend your index finger fully forward.
hints.middle_pip: Curl your middle, ring, and pinky fingers down.

L.orientation_hint: Form an L shape with thumb up, index finger pointing forward.

hints.index_pip: Curl your index, middle, and ring fingers down.

Y.orientation_hint: Palm faces you, with thumb and pinky extended.
